channel.title: An error with client.java - please help!
channel.description:
When I compile my server I get an error -
client.java:14063: illegal start of expression public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { ^ 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .
Please post anyway i can fix it?
Thanks,
Angel

item.title: An error with client.java - please help!
item.dc:creator: @ArtemisVorarg ArtemisVorarg
item.description:
@ArtemisVorarg wrote:

Oh thank you sooo much!

item.source: An error with client.java - please help!

item.title: An error with client.java - please help!
item.dc:creator: @Tenacious_T Tenacious T
item.description:
@Tenacious_T wrote:

Ok what this means is that

client.java:14063: illegal start of expression public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {

Public Void is not suppose to be used at the begining of that line, so go into your client.java search for

public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount)

and see if the line above it has a } if it does not, then that means you just have to add that there, if it does then that means that that code does not belong there i hope this helped

Read full topic
